Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
86 Saraṇaduka, Uppannattika
Saraṇaduka, Uppannattika
98.
271Saraṇo anuppanno dhammo nasaraṇassa naanuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye cattāri.
272Araṇo uppādī dhammo naaraṇassa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Araṇo uppādī dhammo nasaraṇassa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, upanissaye dve.
<< 85 Saraṇaduka, Maggārammaṇattikaup87 Saraṇaduka, Atītattika >>
